title: 20 Low Priority Q for a >5 min afk period (happens often but I come back)
body:
I unfortunately have a old 2013 un-optimized  Alienware Laptop That cannot keep up with most games anymore. Fortunately it has the ability to run league on near max settings at 60 fps.  I am curious to see if anyone else has the issue where the game crashes, the game recognizes it crashes, knocks me to the reconnect button. The reconnect button doesn't work.  I have to relog and then I am able to reconnect in 3 mins and 42 seconds. I reconnect and we win the game about 15 mins later, I have an even kda and a few assists.  I get 20 min Low priority after the game for multiple offenses of this small  issue, which is out of my control. The game is crashing!  I always come back within 5 minutes. Every time. 
All I really want to know is if others are having this troubling issue as the afk's that reconnect quickly have dramatically increased over the past few patches, not to mention I haven't ever bug splat like this since S4/Pre-S5. 
(Wrote this complaint in 20 min low priority Q)


-Just a Lonely Na Cardboard Player

replies.body:
It takes a trend of disconnection to land in a low priority queue, a single game will not result in a penalty. Because disconnections negatively affect everyone in the match, regardless of intent, the system treats all disconnections equally. This is a key reason why penalties cannot be removed or modified in any way. 

Bugsplats are often caused by driver or windows performance issues, and our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) goes over the most common solutions for them. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after taking the steps in that guide.

Thanks, I forgot to put in there that it happened  twice in one game and then another in the next resulting in the low priority Q.  I appreciate the quick response and I will definitely check out the guide. 
By the way It is not always a bug splat sometimes It just kicks me out and tells me the game crashed and the reconnect does not work when I try from there, but does work when i relog and attempt from the relog screen.  

Love the Game 
Cardboard IV NA Player
